title: Authors and Citation
text: Sonnenberg H (2022). kwb.package: Install / Unstall KWB Packages Show Package Dependencies. R package version 0.3.0, https://github.com/kwb-r/kwb.package.
code: @Manual{,   title = {kwb.package: Install / Unstall KWB Packages and Show Package Dependencies},   author = {Hauke Sonnenberg},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.3.0},   url = {https://github.com/kwb-r/kwb.package}, }

title: Install / Unstall KWB Packages and Show Package Dependencies
text: installing latest release R package run following code :
code: # Enable repository from kwb-r options(repos = c(   kwbr = 'https://kwb-r.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))  # Download and install kwb.package in R install.packages('kwb.package')  # Browse the kwb.package manual pages help(package = 'kwb.package')

title: Get Package Files to Install — getPackageFilesToInstall
code: getPackageFilesToInstall(   package.dir = defaultPackageDir(),   packageNames = NULL,   filepattern = "",   full.names = TRUE,   dbg = FALSE,   warn = TRUE )

title: Get Package Files to Install — getPackageFilesToInstall
text: package.dir full path directory containing package files packageNames optional vector character containing names packages installed. NULL (default), available packages package.dir installed, filepattern pattern matching names files considered. Default: "^kwb\..*\.zip$" full.names TRUE (default) full paths package files returned, else file names dbg TRUE (default) debug messages shown warn TRUE (default) warnings given corresponding package files found

title: Get Package Files to Install — getPackageFilesToInstall
text: character vector containing full paths just names   available package files

title: Install GitHub Packages — installGithubPackages
text: Install GitHub Packages

title: Install GitHub Packages — installGithubPackages
code: installGithubPackages(   lib,   repos,   dependencies = TRUE,   upgrade = "never",   auth_token = Sys.getenv("GITHUB_PAT") )

title: Install GitHub Packages — installGithubPackages
text: lib path R library packages installed repos vector relative paths GitHub repositories containing  R packages (e.g. "kwb-r/kwb.utils") dependencies passed remotes::install_github(). TRUE shorthand "Depends", "Imports", "LinkingTo" "Suggests"  NA shorthand "Depends", "Imports" "LinkingTo" default. FALSE shorthand dependencies (.e. just check package, dependencies), (default: TRUE) upgrade passed install_github, (default: "never") auth_token GitHub Personal Access token, required scope "private" access non-public R packages required (default: Sys.getenv("GITHUB_PAT"))

title: Install GitHub Packages — installGithubPackages
text: installs multiple GitHub R packages one R library

title: Install GitHub Packages — installGithubPackages
code: if (FALSE) { remotes::install_github("kwb-r/pkgmeta")  pkgs <- pkgmeta::get_github_packages() paths_list <- list(   r_version = kwb.packages::getRVersionMajorMinor(),   lib_linux = "/usr/lib/R/site-library",   lib_win = "<win_root_dir>/kwbran/<r_version>" )  paths <- kwb.utils::resolve(paths_list, win_root_dir = tempdir())  pkgs <- pkgmeta::get_github_packages()  installGithubPackages(lib = paths$lib_win, pkgs$full_name) installGithubPackages(lib = paths$lib_linux, pkgs$full_name) }
